page.title: 09VILLAGE HALL
page.content: Once the village school,is an excellent stone building with oil fired central heating standing in the middle of the village.It is truly a community centre.It consists of a main hall which seats 120 people,a games room,snooker room,kitchen,cloakroom cum committee room.Attached to the main building is a caretaker's cottage. The Hall is open MON. to SAT.6-10pm. The administration is by committee a President,2 Vice Presidents,a Secretary and 9 others from organisations which use the hall regularly:-Young Farmers,Women's Institute,Youth Club,Parochial Church Council and the Children's Dancing Class. Maintenance costs about Â£1700 a year,this is met by having an annual Fete,from grants,donations,lettings.
